Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class HelloController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HelloController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for all the interactions of the user before entering a game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Method that is called when the fxml file is loaded.
    protected void
    onConnectButtonClick()
    Method called when the connect button is clicked It checks if the parameters inserted in the text fields are correct and then tries to connect to the server At the end displays the new buttons used for accessing a game When it connects it preloads the game scene
    protected void
    onCreateButtonClick()
    Method called when the create game button is clicked It displays all the information for the correct creation of the game
    protected void
    onGoButtonClick()
    Method called when the go button is clicked It asks the server to create a new game and changes scene afterward
    protected void
    onInsertNameButtonClick()
    Method called when the insert name button is clicked It sends to the server the nickname and proceeds to display the buttons for the creation and the joining of a game
    protected void
    onJoinRandomButtonClick()
    Method called when the join button is clicked It tries to join a game and changes scene afterward if successful
    protected void
    onJoinSelectedButtonClick()
    Method called when the join button is clicked It tries to join a game and changes scene afterward if successful
    protected void
    onRecoverButtonClick()
    Method called when the recover button is clicked It tries to recover a game (if there is one already with its name, it will join it)
    protected void
    onRefreshLobbiesButtonClick()
    This method is called when the corresponding button is clicked.
    void
    setGuiView(GUIView guiView)
    Setter of the view
    void
    setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Setter of the current stage

    • onConnectButtonClick

      protected void onConnectButtonClick()
      Method called when the connect button is clicked It checks if the parameters inserted in the text fields are correct and then tries to connect to the server At the end displays the new buttons used for accessing a game When it connects it preloads the game scene

    • onInsertNameButtonClick

      protected void onInsertNameButtonClick()
      Method called when the insert name button is clicked It sends to the server the nickname and proceeds to display the buttons for the creation and the joining of a game

    • onJoinRandomButtonClick

      protected void onJoinRandomButtonClick()
      Method called when the join button is clicked It tries to join a game and changes scene afterward if successful

    • onJoinSelectedButtonClick

      protected void onJoinSelectedButtonClick()
      Method called when the join button is clicked It tries to join a game and changes scene afterward if successful

    • onRecoverButtonClick

      protected void onRecoverButtonClick()
      Method called when the recover button is clicked It tries to recover a game (if there is one already with its name, it will join it)

    • onCreateButtonClick

      protected void onCreateButtonClick()
      Method called when the create game button is clicked It displays all the information for the correct creation of the game

    • onGoButtonClick

      protected void onGoButtonClick()
      Method called when the go button is clicked It asks the server to create a new game and changes scene afterward

    • onRefreshLobbiesButtonClick

      protected void onRefreshLobbiesButtonClick()
      This method is called when the corresponding button is clicked. It asks the server which lobbies are available and displays them in the choice box
